Class Puzzle

java.lang.Object
  Puzzle

public class Puzzle
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a single Sudoku puzzle.

Constructor Detail

Puzzle

public Puzzle(int level,
              int location)
Constructs a puzzle using a game from either the Internet (http://show.websudoku.com) or the Games folder (previously downloaded games).

Parameters:
level - the difficulty of the game. Legal values are Puzzle.EASY, Puzzle.MEDIUM, Puzzle.HARD, and Puzzle.EVIL.
location - the location of the puzzle. Legal values are Puzzle.INTERNET and Puzzle.FILE.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when either the level or location are not in range.
java.lang.Error - when the retrived puzzle format is incorrect.
Method Detail

getPuzzleFromInternet

private void getPuzzleFromInternet()
Gets a puzzle from the Internet (http://show.websudoku.com).

Throws:
MalformedURLException - - should never happen.
java.lang.Error - when websudoku can't be accessed.

getPuzzleFromFile

private void getPuzzleFromFile()
Gets a puzzle from the Games folder (previously downloaded from http://show.websudoku.com).

Throws:
java.lang.Error - when file can't be accessed - should not happen.

getOriginalValue

public int getOriginalValue(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
Gets the original puzzle value at location loc.

Parameters:
loc - the location of the value
Returns:
the puzzle value

getSolutionValue

public int getSolutionValue(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
Gets the solution puzzle value at location loc.

Parameters:
loc - the location of the solution value
Returns:
the puzzle solution value

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Downloads games into the Games folder for offline play.

Parameters:
args - not used
Throws:
java.lang.Error - when websudoku can't be accessed.
